attributes.action: National Holiday to celebrate the work of the NHS after Coronavirus Pandemic.
attributes.additional_details: We ask the government to agree a national holiday called NHS day. The NHS staff are the front line of this world war on Coronavirus and as such are our hero’s.
attributes.background: When the Coronavirus pandemic has subsided we need a national holiday to celebrate the work that the NHS have done. On this day we will dress up as doctors & nurses in celebration.

rejection.details:
You may wish to sign this petition calling for the same action: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/303882

You can find out more about coronavirus and how you can protect yourself and others here:

NHS website: https://www.nhs.uk/conditions/coronavirus-covid-19/
UK Government website: https://www.gov.uk/coronavirus

You can read NHS tips to help if you are worried about coronavirus here: https://www.nhs.uk/oneyou/every-mind-matters/coronavirus-covid-19-anxiety-tips
